head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RUZICKA, FRANCIS FREDERICK, JR., M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RUZICKA, FRANCIS FREDERICK, JR., M.D.

block.p: RUZICKA-Francis Frederick, Jr., M.D. On July 12, 2000, Francis Frederick Ruzicka, Jr., M.D. of Bozman, Maryland, formerly of Baltimore, MD, Madison, WI and New York City; beloved husband of the late Margaret M. Ruzicka (nee Kernan). Devoted father of Margaret R. Rice of Downers Grove, IL., Mary Frances Ruzicka, PhD of Maplewood, NJ. John F. Ruzicka of New York, NY and London, England. Francis Frederick Ruzicka, III of Bethesda, MD, M. Therese Ruzicka of Milwaukee, WI and Joseph T. Ruzicka, PhD of Brooklyn, NY. Also survived by three grandchildren and two greatgrandchildren. A funeral liturgy will be celebrated at St. Michaels Catholic Chapel, St. Michaels, MD on Saturday, July 15, at 12:00 PM. Interment will be private. Memorial donations may be made to the Society of St. Vincent de Paul, in care of Saint's Peter and Paul Catholic Church, 215 Goldsborough Street, Easton, MD. 21601.
